articles.description: Gaga released a ballad Tuesday — titled “Hold My Hand” — for the jam-packed sequel to the 1986 Tom Cruise movie “Top Gun.”
articles.content:
“Top Gun: Maverick” director Joseph Kosinski had his doubts about Lady Gaga contributing to the soundtrack for the upcoming action film.
Gaga, 36, released a ballad Tuesday titled “Hold My Hand” for… [+3068 chars]

articles.author: Sarah Whitten
articles.title: Dead priest's niece sues Catholic University, auction house to block sale of Judy Garland 'Wizard of Oz' dress - CNBC
articles.description: The niece of a long-dead priest is suing to block the sale of one of Judy Garland's iconic "Wizard of Oz" frocks that was missing for decades.
articles.content:
Forget the ruby slippers. Dorothy's dress is now the most contentious piece of clothing in the Land of Oz.

articles.title: 'Life lately': Kaley Cuoco confirms she's dating Tom Pelphrey with PDA pics - USA TODAY
articles.description: Kaley Cuoco and Tom Pelphrey confirmed they're dating with PDA photos, marking her first public relationship since her divorce from Karl Cook in 2021.
articles.content:
Kaley Cuoco and Tom Pelphrey make one cute pair!
